item.title: By: Omid

item.description: Sounds good! Thanks for sharing this with the world. I'm totally with you on this. It's hard to get passed by the "so what to do with this hammer" phase.
item.content:encoded:
Sounds good! Thanks for sharing this with the world.
I’m totally with you on this. It’s hard to get passed by the “so what to do with this hammer” phase.
